p: Swiss female mice (Janvier Labs, Le Genest-Saint-Isle, France) with a body weight of ∼25 g were obtained and allowed to acclimate for a minimum of 5 days prior to use. Environmental controls for the animal room were set to maintain a temperature of 16 to 22 °C, a relative humidity of 30 to 70%, and a 12:12 hourly light-dark cycle.
